Opus is an open source audio codec that provides better quality per bitrate than mp3 (and many other well-known formats). It is 100% free to use and distribute.

Official website                 : http://www.opus-codec.org/
Wikipedia article                : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Opus_%28audio_codec%29

You can open the file with VLC, Firefox, Chrome or Foobar2000.
